restarter.partial_crash_warn: Due to a partial crash, this server will restart in 1 minute. Please disconnect now.
restarter.partial_crash_warn_discord: Due to a partial crash, **%{servername}** will restart in 1 minute.
restarter.schedule_warn: Der Server wird in %{smart_count} Minute neugestartet. Bitte trenne die Verbindung jetzt. |||| Der Server wird in %{smart_count} Minuten neu gestartet.
restarter.schedule_warn_discord: **%{servername}** wird in %{smart_count} neugestartet. |||| **%{servername}** wird in %{smart_count} Minuten neu gestartet.
